code: import axios from'axios';export var register=function register(data){return axios.post("https://mern-api-v0yi.onrender.com/api/v1/register",data);};export var login=function login(data){return axios.post("https://mern-api-v0yi.onrender.com/api/v1/login",data);};export var logout=function logout(){return axios.get("https://mern-api-v0yi.onrender.com/api/v1/logout");};export var createQuizz=function createQuizz(data){return axios.post("https://mern-api-v0yi.onrender.com/api/v1/createQuizz",data);};export var getQuizz=function getQuizz(){return axios.get("https://mern-api-v0yi.onrender.com/api/v1/getQuizzes");};export var getQuizzDetails=function getQuizzDetails(id){return axios.get("https://mern-api-v0yi.onrender.com/api/v1/quizz/".concat(id));};
